rev.comment: duplicating it in the infobox when it already exists in the athletics section violates minimal use requirements of [[WP:NFCC]] which is POLICY. A template isn't policy.

}}'''Fordham University''' is a [[private university|private]] [[university]]<ref name="carnegie">{{cite web|url=http://www.carnegiefoundation.org/classifications/sub.asp?key=748&subkey=15295&start=782|title=Institutions: Fordham University|publisher=Carnegie Foundation|accessdate=2009-01-02}}</ref> in the [[United States]], with three campuses located in and around [[New York City]]. It was founded by the [[Roman Catholic Archdiocese of New York|Roman Catholic Diocese of New York]] in 1841 as ''St. John's College'', placed in the care of the [[Society of Jesus]] shortly thereafter, and has since become an [[Independent school|independent institution]] under a [[laity|lay]] Board of [[Trustee]]s which describes the university as "in the [[Society of Jesus|Jesuit]] tradition."<ref name="ataglance">{{cite web|url=http://www.fordham.edu/discover_fordham/fordham_at_a_glance/|title=Fordham at a Glance|publisher=Fordham University|accessdate=2009-01-02}}</ref>
}}'''Fordham University''' is a [[private university|private]] [[university]]<ref name="carnegie">{{cite web|url=http://www.carnegiefoundation.org/classifications/sub.asp?key=748&subkey=15295&start=782|title=Institutions: Fordham University|publisher=Carnegie Foundation|accessdate=2009-01-02}}</ref> in the [[United States]], with three campuses located in and around [[New York City]]. It was founded by the [[Roman Catholic Archdiocese of New York|Roman Catholic Diocese of New York]] in 1841 as ''St. John's College'', placed in the care of the [[Society of Jesus]] shortly thereafter, and has since become an [[Independent school|independent institution]] under a [[laity|lay]] Board of [[Trustee]]s which describes the university as "in the [[Society of Jesus|Jesuit]] tradition."<ref name="ataglance">{{cite web|url=http://www.fordham.edu/discover_fordham/fordham_at_a_glance/|title=Fordham at a Glance|publisher=Fordham University|accessdate=2009-01-02}}</ref>
